subtitles.text: Seen, it's Tubai Factory!
Our new album will be released on February 21, 2024!
The title is Third Moment.

The album will include all the singles we have performed since Yumi Kasai, Ori Egishi, Mari Fukuda, and Uchi Yofu joined the group, as well as songs we have performed only at our live shows, plus a few new songs.
Takuya Nakajima and SHOCK-EYE of Shonan no Kaze also contributed songs.
Thank you very much.
This is the third song that SHOCK-EYE has contributed, following Happy Cracker and Boys' Eyeism.
We have also done a recording, and that song is really nice.
The key sound is amazing.
There are many different songs, but I get the feeling that there will be not one but several songs that everyone can call and respond to.
I'm really looking forward to that.

Among the 4 wonderfully recorded songs, there are songs that have never been on Tsubaki Factory before, and there are songs that are very Tsubaki-esque, so I think you will really enjoy even the 4 songs.
Please get it.
The Limited First Edition comes with a variety of special features.

First of all, the Limited First Edition A includes all music videos of songs released after Tears for Heroine, Rattlesnake Diamonds, and Yakusoku Konnichiwa Kinenhi, as well as previously unreleased music videos that were not included on the bonus Blu-ray of the singles.
Amazing.
And to introduce you to it, there are many, many more, including a close-up version of the troubled nakirui kobangeki close-up version, and an evergreen version of Weakness Not Weakness Yoko Ewa.
And the Limited First Edition B comes with a video of the live performance of Tsubaki Factory's Summer Festival 2023 Shakunetsu held this summer.
This year's Shakunetsu was a new challenge for me, and I played the Japanese drums.
I was really nervous, but I was also quite surprised by my fans, so I hope you can enjoy watching us in various ways.
Tsubaki Factory's new album 3rd Moment will be released on February 21, 2024. Please listen to it.
And I have one more announcement.
On March 10, 2024, Tsubaki Factory will be holding a live concert to celebrate the 7th anniversary of their major debut.
We are able to hold the 7th anniversary live thanks to all of you who support us everyday.
The venue is Ichikawa City Cultural Hall. We hope to create memories of our 7th anniversary with you all.
We look forward to seeing you there.
This is Tsubaki Factory.
Thank you for watching.
Hello! This time we have Shizo Tanaka of Angulum and Nanami Kubota of Ocha no Ma!
Please stay with us until the end of the show.
Please bear with us until the end!

Well then, let's see how well you two get along.
Yes, ma'am.

Yes, sir.
Red Line is a very cool song.
You can see Angelem's cool or cool-headedness in the song, and I hope you'll pay attention to it.
I hope you'll pay attention to it.
I think those two songs are really cool.
They're very bright and pop songs.

Yes.
I felt like that was the beginning of the new formation of Angeleum.
I think I like it because it gives a sense of a bright future.
Yes, and did I interrupt you?

Yes, sir!
This is our first album.
There are 5 new songs in it.
and the first unit song of Ocha-no-Uma.

We hope many people will listen to it!

The concert in Okayama Prefecture.

Orange makeup.
This year was the 25th anniversary of Hello Project.

Okayama?

One of my dreams came true at a concert in Okayama Prefecture.
A dream?
Yes, I did.
Ever since I was a trainee, I wanted to sing with Masaki Sato.
I had a goal to be on stage with him.
That dream came true for the first time in Okayama Prefecture.
I see. So that's how it was.
I sang next to him and our eyes met a lot.
I will never forget this scene.
I've watched the video a hundred times.
I was smiling.
That's nice.
I see, so you have such memories.
Yes.
So the key to today's makeup was orange?
Yes, that's right.
I told you earlier that I was a bit hesitant.
I used to wear pink makeup.
I wanted to try orange makeup.
I tried orange makeup the other day.
I tried orange makeup the other day, and I felt it blended in better than pink.
